mapper.update: update user_package up , resource_package rp set up.level = rp.level, up.name = rp.name, up.concurrent_num = rp.concurrent_num, up.broadband_rate = rp.broadband_rate, up.proxy_enable = rp.proxy_enable, up.wol_enable = rp.wol_enable, up.resource_package_id = rp.id, up.end_time = null, up.domain_use = 0, up.port_use = 0, up.peer_use = 0, up.flow_use = 0, up.device_use = 0 where rp.id = 1 and up.user_id = #{userId}
update user_package set flow = flow + #{flow} where user_id = #{userId} and (flow + #{flow})>= 0
update user_package set flow = #{flow} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select up.user_id, up.resource_package_id, up.`level`, up.`name`, up.end_time, su.email as userEmail from user_package up left join t_sys_users su on su.id = up.user_id where up.user_id >0 and up.end_time < sysdate()

select up.user_id, up.resource_package_id, rp.name, up.`level`, up.`flow`, up.`name`, up.end_time, rp.flow_num as resourcePackageFlow, su.email as userEmail from user_package up left join resource_package rp on up.resource_package_id = rp.id left join t_sys_users su on su.id = up.user_id where up.user_id >0 and up.level > 0 and up.end_time > sysdate()
